text: pavitra tingalugalige pavitra tingalugale parihara. Hageye, ella pavitragalu ‘kisas’na (pratikarada) niyamagalige adhinavagive. Nim'ma mele atikramavesagidavara mele nivu, (heccendare) avaru nim'ma mele esagidaste pratikramavannesagiri mattu allahanige anjiri. Allahanu dharma nisthara jotegiddanembudu nimage tilidirali
